website_summaries.verdict: This shampoo aims to extend the life of salon color, while also lightening hair several shades depending on the length of time it's left on.
pros: Lifts highlights and eliminates brassy tones while leaving hair feeling healthy and giving it fullness
Adds shine and offers UV protection
cons: It doesn't lather up much, which can cause some tangling

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!!!!!!!Best product I have used in years!!
customer_reviews.text: After one use My hair was in such beautiful condition,, it not only toned down the brassiness but, left my hair so much healthier,,used it over a week now and My hair looks and feel 100 percent better,,I will not be without this product ever,,In love!!
customer_reviews.author: BunnyNy

customer_reviews.title: First time using purple shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Used just one time on my daughters hair and noticed a difference. Very pleased with this product. I honestly didn't expect anything and was so shocked.
customer_reviews.author: Quila

customer_reviews.title: Great Purple Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this purple shampoo! My hi lights were turning a brassy/orange color & I was not loving it. So I decided to try some of this stuff since the price was very reasonable compared to other purple shampoos I had been looking at. It worked great the first time I use it. You don't need to use a lot of product, which is nice. It feels great and works awesome. I have very oily hair so that is always something I am concerned about with build up, but there was no build up and it did not make my oily hair worse!
customer_reviews.author: tara miller

customer_reviews.title: Great cool tone blonde
customer_reviews.text: PSA...for those who highlight their hair blonde, I highly recommend Kick purple shampoo! Takes away all the brass and leaves a cool tone blonde. I’ve been coloring and highlighting my own hair for 15.5 years and this has made my highlight come out just the way I’ve been trying for. (No filter)
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far it's kept my highlights nice and blonde and no brassy orange color. It doesn't really lather or have a scent but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Dannette F.

customer_reviews.title: Naturally white & grey hair look fantastic after using Kick active/purple shampoo as directed.
customer_reviews.text: Love how effective this shampoo is it keeping the brassiness and yellow tones at Bay. You definitely need a spray-on conditioner or deep conditioning once in awhile and it is vital that you use cool and/cold water while shampooing to keep your hair looking its best when using this type of toning shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT TURNED ORANGE BRASSY TO GOLDEN AND THEN VANILLA IN 5 WASHES
customer_reviews.text: IT TURNED MY ORANGE BRASSY DO IT YOUR SELF DYE JOB TO GOLDEN BLONDE IN 2 WASHES AND NOW IS TURNING THAT GOLDEN BLONDE TO A LOVELY COOL VANILLA WITH THE SUBSEQUENT WASHES. ADDITIONALLY, IT CHANGED MY GRAY STRANDS TO LOOK LIKE HIGHLIGHTS. I'M NOT GOING TO NEED TO GET A HIGHLIGHT JOB FOR QUITE A WHILE AS A RESULT. THIS WORKS SO FAST. IT ALSO BRIGHTENED MY VANILLA HIGHLIGHTS FROM MY LAST HIGHLIGHTING SESSION BEFORE THE BRASSY SELF DYE JOB I GAVE MYSELF. THIS IS THE BOMB OF ALL PURPLE SHAMPOOS!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A Opalk

customer_reviews.title: Works on blondes-smells great
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo works really great on blonde hair. Unfortunately, it does not really help with the darker parts of the hair such as the roots, the crown and underneath. It smells fantastic and it does not stain my fingers, or leave my hair purple. It does however, dry out my hair quite a bit and I wish it lathered easier. I have to use a large quantity when I wash my hair due to the length and the lack of lathering. Other than that, it is a terrific shampoo to take out the brass and brighten up the blonde, therefore I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my hair ashy/silver!
customer_reviews.text: I was an all natural brunette when I decided to go blonde again. My stylist said to get a purple shampoo. The one I had used previously wasn’t doing what it was supposed to do, so I started looking online.I ordered KICK and was using it every other shampoo and my stylist said to use every shampoo. It smells great and leaves my hair ready for conditioner. My hair is ashy, medium blond with silver. KICK has kept the grey/ash tone and it’s been over a month since my hair has been processed. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Carwile

customer_reviews.title: Affordable but not the best option
customer_reviews.text: I tried out this brand instead of using my normal MIlkshake purple shampoo. This one doesn't really have a small, which is fine, but I don't see a huge change in my hair after it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Probably going to be my staple purple shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Comparing to the other purple shampoo's I've been using before, this one works better on ridding the copper tones on my bleach blonde hair. Plus, the formula of the shampoo makes it less runny (?) than the other that I have used, so less chance for my fingernails to be dyed purple as well. It smells nice but very subtle/mellow: that can be a pro depending on the person but for me it's good. Cause I use another shampoo and conditioner for fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps remove brassy tones from hair.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo DOES work! It does what it claims to do but please follow the directions! If you don't wet your hair enough or if you leave it on longer than suggested, it can and will turn your hair gray or purple. I have used it several times with good results but the one time I left it in a little long, I had a gray streak in my hair. 🙈 Took about a week but it faded. Lesson learned. 😉 Also, it does strip your hair of moisture and you will need to use a good conditioner afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This Shampoo Really Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purple shampoo I’ve ever used. I tried Joico before this brand and Joico didn’t really lather and left my hair dry. This stuff makes my hair noticeably less brassy each time I use it and it lathers great! I don’t think I could ever use a different brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: I do believe it's as good as a salon product
customer_reviews.text: It could have more of a moisturizer and it really doesnt have a smell to it
customer_reviews.author: Selene Woitt

customer_reviews.title: Forever customer!
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOODNESS!!!!!!!!!!!! I have very fine curly hair. (Not cute curly) never in all these years have I found anything to tame my frizz! I have tried 100s of different shampoo/conditioners, oils, etc. SO HAPPY! I noticed just a slight lift of the brass but I also might not have left it on long enough.
customer_reviews.author: bmoon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is a waste of money. Not only doesn’t it work in anyway that is discernible, but it also made my hair feel like straw. Don’t waste your money on this tiny bottle of expensive purple shampoo. You would be better off buying a bottle of shampoo at the dollar store and adding purple food coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Karen's Stuff

customer_reviews.title: it works great
customer_reviews.text: Keeping my blonde hair blonde You may need a Conditioner or detangler after using the shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Brett B.

customer_reviews.title: Brighter, shinier blond hair!
customer_reviews.text: My hair was a golden blond with some lighter streaks that were natural from the sun. After 1 use I noticed it being instantly brighter, shinier and a little bit lighter- almost a platinum blond in the lighter streaks. It is gorgeous!! The second time I either had the same or even brighter results. I love this!! Anyone with blond hair should try it because my hair color is gorgeous. Only complaint is it initially made my hair tangled but I just followed with my regular conditioner and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shampoo. It helps town down the brassiness well water puts in my hair. It has a nice smell too
customer_reviews.author: WI Teach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purple Shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: It works beautifully! It really enhances my blonde highlights. My husband has silver hair and it makes his hair really shine. It definitely removes any brassiness of yellow that might be there. We both LOVE Kick purple shampoo! It works beautifully! It really enhances my blonde highlights. My husband has silver hair and it makes his hair really shine. It definitely removes any brassiness of yellow that might be there. We both LOVE Kick purple shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Patriciahf

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I went from dark brown to a light blonde but found that I had too much brassiness left behind. I wanted to try this before frying my hair with more dye and I am so glad that I tried this first! It doesn't remove all of the brassiness, but it does tone it down to a more natural looking blonde. I love the smell of this product and I think I made the right decision purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally blonde and graying hair which I highlight every few months to cover the grey. With the lack of access to salons this year I have decided to forego highlights and let the natural grey come in. On the advice of my stylist I ordered this purple shampoo. I love it! I use 2 x per week which is about every other shampoo. Smells great. Grey looks platinum blonde. Everyone compliments my natural color. It is a little drying so you need conditioner after shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Jobe

customer_reviews.title: N O
customer_reviews.text: DONT DO IT!! I’ve been using pure all a G for almost 15 years and think it’s a great product but perhaps over the years normal hormone changes have my hair getting brassy sooner after a color treatment so I thought I’d try this and what a mistake! My hair is frizzy as if I have an Afro and I need to put conditioner on (couldn’t find a conditioner in the same brand)And actually just leave it in my hair so it doesn’t frizz out Like crazy! My hair has a wave to it but this stuff makes it look like straw. I tried it four times and will never use it again even if someone paid me to try.
customer_reviews.author: Yogini

customer_reviews.title: Brassy tones gone!
customer_reviews.text: I color my hair blonde and always have to deal with brassy tones afterwards. This shampoo definitely gets rid of the brassy tones, just using it once a week. Just use a good conditioner after using the shampoo, as it does dry your hair out.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: It worked great where others failed
customer_reviews.text: to our preferred customers. It actually worked to calm my pandemic DIY home dye job. I had intense orange and yellow hair and other shampoos that claimed to be able to help, didn’t help at all. There was a noticeable difference with the first use and by the second use, I was content. I need another application of bleach but Kick made it possible to wait longer to improve the condition of my hair first.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY OLEARY

customer_reviews.title: Quick results!
customer_reviews.text: Before the use of this product, my hair was VERY yellowy from an ‘at home’ balayage kit I ordered. I could no longer afford to get professional balayage and the results were definitely suboptimal. BUT, I researched ways to fix it without going to the salon, and I came upon the use of purple shampoos. This one had excellent ratings on Amazon and it was a good price. So I went for it! And it immediately brightened a lot of pieces of the yellow hair. After 3 washes, I LOVE the color of my hair! I’m so pleased that it brought it to a ‘cooler’ place, which is definitely a fresher look!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing the orange!
customer_reviews.text: I had highlights done a couple weeks ago and I hated them! This shampoo has brightened the highlights, got rid of the brassiness and given me my confidence back. I love this shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Heatherestial

customer_reviews.title: Bottle bummer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using a different purple shampoo for my natural blonde hair for the last 8 years so I decided to switch it up a bit, so after seeing all the fantastic reviews about this one I really wanted to like this right out of the box, but unfortunately...I got this exploded purple mess of a bottle. Please package better. I feel I lost so much product already and I haven’t used it yet. I don’t wish to return so I’ll suffer lol. I’ll update my comment after I review this product.
customer_reviews.author: CEBREVIEW

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this brand because it was a little bit cheaper than Shimmer Lights. I usually use Shimmer lights and love it. Kick did not get the brashness out of my hair the way shimmer lights does. I ended up throwing the rest of the bottle away and buying what I normally get. I used 3/4 of the bottle and tried leaving it on longer, etc. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ALT

customer_reviews.title: I AM OBSESSED!!! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely obsessed with KICK purple shampoo! I love that it is sulfate Free first of all and secondly it completely takes the brass out! I love the silver look it’s given my brassy before blonde! I love that you can leave it on for longer to achieve a different hue it’s completely workable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!  I loved it...
customer_reviews.text: I tried so mane purple shampoo before but it took a while to see some results in my hair but with Rick shampoo I saw the results on the first wash, even my roommates asking me if I had Dye my hair. They said it was so beautiful. Thank you for the amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: M Said

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much instantly took away brassy/yellow tones in my hair. I recently did an ombre with red at my roots and blonde the rest of the length of my hair, so Ive had to be careful about getting the bleached parts too yellow/orange and this shampoo completely takes care of that! Not only does it work for toning, but it left my hair super soft and manageable after blow drying!
customer_reviews.author: CMW

customer_reviews.title: Did what I wanted it to do
customer_reviews.text: Here's a real review...I've used the product twice. I bought it because during the pandemic, my not so blood roots were looking rough so I used a box. the color was fine, except my new hair was brassy and I wanted that to go away. I have used it twice and my hair is not so brassy. It wasn't amazing results, but it was less brassy. It does make your hair very dry after you rinse it out, but nothing conditioner doesn't fix. All in all, it's a good product.I'm less red/brassy. that's all i wanted
customer_reviews.author: Amber O.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on Silver Hair
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait till it arrived. I was in the shower washing my hair within 30 mins of my package arriving. It takes out all the brassiness, my hair was shiny, soft, moisturized. I will buy again. I love that my silver, gray, white and still have some black hairs look & feel great. The Scent was ok. I am thankful it did not linger after washing my hair. The scent is not bad just not to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dempsey & Di Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Great at eliminating yellow and brassy tones
customer_reviews.text: Kick purple shampoo has been amazing at keeping my platinum/silver hair color refreshed and free of any brassy tone or yellow in my hair. It makes the upkeep (for platinum/white/silver) much easier and longer lasting before I have to touch it up again with bleach and/or color depositing conditioner. Before I found Kick, it was very difficult completely getting the yellow out of my hair, even after multiple bleachings. Using Kick has made it so I don't have to damage my hair as much to achieve the color and tone that I want. I have been using it for about a year now and am about to order my third bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to use!
customer_reviews.text: This product has done wonders for my hair! I’ve gotten so many compliments and have people ask all the time if I’ve had it done recently, but the only change in my routine is this shampoo! I do wish it was more moisturizing, but following it up with conditioner seems to do the trick! Will absolutely continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for permanent blue hue
customer_reviews.text: I left it on for barely 2 minutes now I have a blue tone to my hair, I cant get it to wash out..I'm very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: First time using a purple shampoo and I really liked this one! I was even given compliments after use in if I dyed my hair again. Got rid of that brassy yellow tone and left my hair soft. Actually can’t wait to wash again to see more of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jhordan Blumenberg

customer_reviews.title: Brightens and tones blonde hair!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write review so I had a chance to use this product a few times first. I LOVE it! I have thin, long ashy blonde hair and it really tones and brightens it up. I also feel like this product pulls all the old product out of my hair and makes it feel fuller and not so weighed down. I have used many ‘purple’ shampoos in the past and this is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice purple toning shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent. Like any typical good purple toning shampoo it is very drying, so use a good conditioner. I didn't notice a WOW difference after 1 use,however others in my family did. I do feel it made my hair look fresher(color wise), and I did find some areas of old blonde rejuvenated to a beautiful ash white. Will continue use and see where it goes. All in all great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Iva Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Product received was used/previously opened.
customer_reviews.text: The product was not sealed when I opened the top. The seal/tab was already opened on both of the bottles of purple shampoo that I ordered at the same time. So not happy receiving a used product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: Turned my dingy yellow hair white. It works great. Especially for us bleached blondes that get a little too yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Linda  Sue

customer_reviews.title: Grey Hair
customer_reviews.text: I used my shampoo as soon as I got it, which was very quick delivery, left it on 5 minutes. It really did take some of the brass out of my grey hair. I smoke so I had that dark color to parts of my hair. Didn't take all of it away but I imagine when I use it again it will. Works better than the other name brand I was using. I will probably use it twice a week for a few weeks, it did make the grey brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Ann Price

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with my colorist again!
customer_reviews.text: My hightlights and pretty much blended in with the rest of my hair. After just one was they magically returned and have gotten progressively brighter with every wash. The definition between the various colors has brought me back to what I wanted when I got it done in the first place. It's reminded why I love my colorist so much. Not to mention how much smoother and softer it is now. I couldn't have asked for much more from a shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: lfauver

customer_reviews.title: Works well for keeping blonde Highlights light, bright and shiny
customer_reviews.text: I had recently gotten my hair highlighted and I bought this shampoo to see if it would help keep my hair light and bright. It works so well my daughter asked me the other day if I had gotten my hair highlighted again!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Use conditioner
customer_reviews.text: So far I think this really works well! However, when using and after rinsing you’re hair is a nightmare lol DEFINITELY need to condition (which it says on the bottle anyway) over all pretty happy!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Riippi

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE BRASS!! AMAZING PRICE N QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly like the super duper expensive salon product, but half the price!! After 5 washes, leaving the product in my hair for 5 mins, my brass hair, (DURING THIS PANDEMIC) turned my hair back to its white blonde!!! I have in laws who are hair stylists, and they even commented on how beautiful the color is!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results after my first treatment!
customer_reviews.text: My first time using any "purple" shampoo and I am in love with the results. I applied after spending a week on vacation and my hair was dull from chlorine and salt water. The treatment revitalized my hair and looks like I just left the salon with fresh highlights!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hueller

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple blonde shampoos, I have always had blonde hair, all shades, golden, platinum and ash. No matter what the shade it always turned brassy after a few weeks. My stylist told me to find a purple shampoo with deep pigment... well I found it! This shampoo definitely delivers all that is claims! It took my brassy ash to a gorgeous ash exactly the way it was when I first had it colored. I am very pleased with the results. I only leave it on for 2 minutes then use a deep conditioner and it leaves my hair soft and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Hairdresser was amazed!
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser thought I put chemicals on my hair to get my blonde color looking this good after 8 weeks with no touch ups! I do not like golden orangey blonde and wanted to achieve a more ashy/platinum blonde and this shampoo helped with that!! I recommend using this once a week. Amazing results!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really  works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I dye my hair blonde and it always pulls warm tones which I hate. Hairdressers couldn't figure it out but finally a product that actually works. I love, love my color and it is so silky smooth. Buy it, you won t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Best "Purple" Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shampoo I have found for my light blonde colored-treated hair. For me, it provides fullness and I really haven't had to use conditioner with it. Excellent product. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle reader Black

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: No matter how many minutes I leave the shampoo on for either 2 minutes or 4 minutes my hair is always left with some purple color. I’m not sure if it’s because my hair is super bleached but it’s pretty annoying because it takes a few washes for it to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Cilla

customer_reviews.title: amazing difference!
customer_reviews.text: My hair had brassy tones from missing my hairdresser during the "sheltering at home" and this shampoo brought back my blond highlights perfectly! I love it! It is necessary to use a moisturizing conditioner after the shampoo which if you have color treated hair is a must anyway!
customer_reviews.author: C. Tooley

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using BUnique (which I love) but I really hate the price. I decided to try Kick and am really impressed. It tones more gradually than some other super saturated purple shampoos, but it also doesn't turn my light blonde/bleached and colored hair purple like some others have in the past. The smell is nice and a little goes a long way. The price is definitely nice too! Really happy I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: May need to use longer than suggested
customer_reviews.text: I needed to use the product for much longer than the bottle suggested, and ended up keeping it on my hair for an hour and taking it off. Before the shampoo, my hair was yellow, not just “a little yellow” but YELLOW yellow. After having this in my hair, everywhere on my head except around my scalp was blond with streaks of white blond which I really like. Around the scalp is yellow still but a lot more subdued and not too noticeable
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but watch the time
customer_reviews.text: Works well to tone brasiness to cooler shades. Would suggest not leaving it on much longer than 5 mins as it can turn your scalp purple tinged which is difficult to get off and might be seen easier on people with thinner hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey M.

customer_reviews.title: Helps maintain your blonde color!
customer_reviews.text: I went blonde from having mocha brown hair color for a while and I had some brassy gold/orange undertones left and this product helped alot and made my hair lighter by the time I went to my 2nd hair session my hair has no brassines left! I use this once a wk on my new ash blonde hair then with a deep conditioning hair mask! It helps maintain the color for a long time it works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine D

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetologist approved*
customer_reviews.text: I have been a hair dresser for 9 years and this product is one of the best shampoos for blonde maintenance. I am naturally a red head, so my undertone is very warm. This shampoo helps tremendously to cut down the warm hues. I waited to give a review until AFTER I used the product for a few days, and I can't believe how well it worked so quickly! Very pleased, I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Dykes

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: Does lighten my hair and reduce brassy tones. Feels dry after the shampoo but once I condition it feels fine. This is my first time ever using purple shampoo so I will continue to see how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie Bortz

customer_reviews.title: Soft and bright!
customer_reviews.text: I love how it pop blonds back to BLONDE! My 13 year old uses it and it doesn't just leave shine and enhance her natural blonds, it cleanses like a teen NEEDS, it never looks oily later when she uses this Kick shampoo. I use it too, because I never seem to get to the salon when I really need to so it softens my grays and blends them in so much more because of the way it shines and brightens up whatever blond highlights are left! It does leave purple suds on the shower walls but rinses right away. Love the smell, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amy N.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works!
customer_reviews.text: I am a brunette trying to go light. I mean pure brunette. Not light brown that can easily go blonde type of brunette. I've never gone through with the blonde transformation because of how brassy my hair gets. This shampoo makes a HUGE difference that you can see as soon as you get out of the shower. I love the shampoo and I will be continuing my brunette to blonde transformation because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Pine

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle, I have natural red undertones in my brunette hair. This helps keep my blond highlights vibrant and keeps them from turning brassy! I do have to use a good conditioner with it but I always love how clean my hair feels after.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: I used to shampoo a little differently than using it in the shower and putting in your hair. I felt the sink with lukewarm water put the shampoo in the sink and then tips my head and soaked my hair in the purple shampoo. It distributes the purple shampoo a little more evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney swapp

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bleach my hair platinum blonde and used another shampoo for years. I did not like the smell of it. This shampoo is fantastic to eliminate brassy, orange and lemon yellow that can often happen. Many of us dread those colors.This is easy on your hair and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lorina Nilsen-Lowman

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo does exactly what it says it will do. It removes brass. I noticed a difference in just once use, which is incredible. No other product that I have found works quite like this one. The only downside that I can even think of is that the purple sometimes stains underneath your nails, but I suppose that's a small price to pay for beautiful hair!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: Blondes love this. Recommend. Softens the hair and to me, it conditions as well. Not afraid to leave it on more than 15 minutes. Worth the money and your hair will love it too. Worth every penny!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C T-J

customer_reviews.title: For stubborn brassiness, use daily on dry hair.
customer_reviews.text: It worked best when I applied to dry hair. I thought I only needed to use it once a week, but I need to use it practically every day to keep the brassiness out. I blame my hair though, not the product. I do need to wear gloves when applying it to dry hair because it stained my cuticles.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described and then some!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! I have always had an issue with brassy color in my blonde...after trying many different purple shampoos....this one will be the one that I continuously purchase! Took the brassy color out of my hair and my blonde is blonder!
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Works! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a cheaper purple shampoo and I also have used a more expensive one bought from Amazon. Honestly my hair has never looked better since using this. My blonde hair is so blonde. I am still amazed.
customer_reviews.author: always hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shampoo!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been hesitant to highlight my brown hair again because it always goes copper or brassy. Finding a product that keeps the blond looking great has been a challenge but this worked great! It is drying (as all purple shampoos are) so I caution not to use more than once or twice a week. Truly the best purple shampoo I’ve used!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I had just bayalaged my hair blonde over light-medium brown and it was very yellow. The purple shampoo has softened it up so much to a more white blonde which was my hope. It looks much better. I had just bayalaged my hair blonde over light-medium brown and it was very yellow. The purple shampoo has softened it up so much to a more white blonde which was my hope. It looks much better. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Brown

customer_reviews.title: Maintains Color & Makes Hair Super Soft
customer_reviews.text: The last time I was able to go to the salon was January - and my hair still looks great because of KICK! Although it's obvious that my roots have grown back in, I still get told that I still look super blonde. Usually my color has faded pretty significantly by this point, but it still has a natural blonde color because of this product! Not only that, but I can definitely tell the difference in the softness of my hair when using KICK and when I don't use KICK. So glad I found a product that maintains my color while also being kind to my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Defibaugh

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I think my old old shimmer Lights from Sally's did the same job. I have used other purple shampoo's but could not remember the name and it was amazing, so off to amazon i ran looking for the same effect, I am looking for that silvery blonde look and this product did not deliver what i wanted. It was minimal at removing the brassiness, however if you do not want a platinum look it may be okay for you. The smell was neutral, it did not get me all owey and gewey. just average........ It did not dry my hair out so that was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Brown

customer_reviews.title: this works great
customer_reviews.text: My natural blonde hair looked dull before (and get darker when I use hairspray), but since I've been using this product- it has brightened my hair and looks like I have highlights (when I don't ). It's awesome. It makes my hair feel thicker, too.
customer_reviews.author: Valorie Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Honestly the best purple shampoo ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purple shampoo I’ve ever used!! I’ve used it about 4 times so far and it has taken my light blonde highlights to platinum blonde! I leave it on for about three minutes and it hasn’t dried out my hair. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't lather and tangles my hair so much in the shower. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo does not lather at all and actually tangles my hair so much. I have used other purple shampoos that keep the color consistent AND fully washes my hair. This shampoo does not clean my hair at all, but leaves it feeling brittle and gross. This shampoo is such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My hair was very brassy and copper looking from using a blonde henna! This Shampoo is Amazing, very rich in color, thick and creamy! After one shampoo I could see a difference. I just needed to use it about 4 times to get my hair looking natural again. I use it once a week to maintain a natural healthy look!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: most amazing toning shampoo
customer_reviews.text: i’ve tried so many toning shampoos this is by far the best, i noticed a huge difference with the first use, left on my hair 5 minutes, it’s a little pricey but so worth it. i highly recommend this shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Carol m.

customer_reviews.title: Purple Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for about three months now. It seems to be working well. It hasn't completely gotten rid of the brassy tones in my hair, but maybe my hair just needs another round of lightener in order to really achieve that effect. Overall, it's a good shampoo and it gets the job done. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: That One Dude

customer_reviews.title: GLAD I FOUND THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo performed as advertised. I didn't have any issues with it drying out my hair. I will continue to use this about once a week. It has a pleasant smell and a little goes a long way. For reference my hair is chin level .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Definitely gets rid of yellow from your bleached hair. Just be careful as leaving it on past about 5 min will leave a blue tint to you platinum color
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Edgar

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to stop coloring my hair and let my grays take over, which means the blonde color left in my hair has oxidized and become brassy. It took two shampoos before I really noticed, but this purple shampoo has really toned done the brassiness in my hair! Even my husband noticed, which is a rare thing. I highly recommend this product. It works! Just follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Terry N

customer_reviews.title: Favorite purple shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Conditioner and Shampoo smell amazing and leaves your hair feeling soft!! Definitely need the conditioner after using the shampoo for the softness.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Brightens up the blonde
customer_reviews.text: This really took the yellow tones out of my hair and it is super blonde and looks great. My hairdresser noticed and wanted to know what brand I used.
customer_reviews.author: Sandii

customer_reviews.title: Loved the color of my highlights using Kick
customer_reviews.text: I am new to using purple shampoo. I bought a purple shampoo from Walmart and ordered Kick just to see the difference in the different brands. I got no results from the other purple shampoo. I love the color of my highlights using Kick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright blonde!
customer_reviews.text: I can really tell the difference in my hair when I use this product. I lather it in and leave it for at least 5 minutes and it has made my blonde highlights bright and shiny! My hair is super soft afterwards as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Toss your other purple shampoos!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other purple shampoos that dry the hair, this left my hair feeling and looking extraordinary. It’s nice when a product actually does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Bollo

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing non-staining happy I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my dark/blonde highlighted hair & daughters full blonde. No staining or drying out. Best Purple shampoo we have tried!
customer_reviews.author: kim!

customer_reviews.title: Blonder and better
customer_reviews.text: Being under a shelter in place notice due to COVID-19 had me stressing about keeping my blonde bright and by brassy. This shampoo has been keeping me blonde (and sane) since I began using it! It also smells nice (not chemically like other purple shampoos I have tried).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E.

customer_reviews.title: Need to brighten that blonde?? This is it!
customer_reviews.text: My hair was bleached out some from the Florida sun. This product restores the brightness and true color and left my hair soft and more manageable!
customer_reviews.author: PVG

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo..I have blonde. & high lites ( a lil bit ) of grey.. 1 use and my hair looked & felt great. As an old hairdresser we used silver mink rinse to achieve this effect...
customer_reviews.author: Flat Heads

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Kick really does what it says it will do: it keeps my blonde highlights blonde. It also makes my hair really shiny and doesn't dry it out like other purple shampoos I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Best purple shampoo to tone brassiness!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purple shampoo I’ve ever used by far!!! I used matrix, biolage way more expensive but the quality of this purple shampoo is so much better! I love it! Just one wash and my hair got the silver tone I wanted! Deffff recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina f

customer_reviews.title: Works really well with processed hair!
customer_reviews.text: The product works really well with my blonde high/lowlight hair. I have a smattering of grey, as well. It's nice shampoo smells nice and makes my hair feel soft, but not too soft. I like the way it doesn't purple up the shower walls like some other purple shampoos! It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Linnette Drzewiecki

customer_reviews.title: The only purple shampoo I am ever using ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purple shampoos I have used. The product has a great scent, as far as purple shampoos go, and it lathers so nicely, so I'm able to get a lot of spots that have a lot of product buildup. it leaves my hair SOFT! Most important, it keeps my color from going brassy far longer then any others - I get my color done every 6-8 weeks and my hairdresser has even commented on how great it is! Never using another shampoo ever!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha N Stach

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! CONTAINS SULFATES
customer_reviews.text: Did not realize it had sulfates in it! Bought it and now have to return it because the sulfates will strip my color! Please make a sulfate free product!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a different brand of purple shampoo for a year or so and have been less than impressed with the results... a couple weeks ago I needed my hair to look great for a wedding and decided to take a chance on Kick ...and wow 🤩 I’m glad I did!!!Kick totally restored my platinum highlights!! I was shocked! It looked like I just left the salon! Not only that, my hair was softer and easier to style! My sister took one look and immediately ordered her own bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Gianna Aycock

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. It works great to tone down brassiness and keeps my honey blonde a little lighter. Very happy I found it, will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Works okay
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well but did not remove as much of the brassiness from my hair as I had expected. I still need a conditioner since if I don’t my hair is dry and hard to comb out and my hair is short.
customer_reviews.author: Lonela

product_meta.title: Purple Shampoo for Blonde Hair – Award Winning, Purple Toning Blonde Shampoo Instantly Brightens & Washes Away Brassy Yellow Tones on Blonde, Silver, Grey Hair – 8oz - KICK
feature_bullets: ELIMINATE BRASS, KICK UP LUMINOSITY - AWARD WINNING purple toning shampoo POWERS UP blonde, silver and grey hair by extending color & lifting away ALL brassy, yellow tones - the IDEAL shampoo for sweaty gym buildup, “Tricky Cases”, platinum hair & perfect as a blue shampoo, shampoo for grey hair, or silver shampoo.

PCA TECHNOLOGY – TOTAL LIGHTENING CONTROL: THE ONLY HIGH PERFORMANCE Purple Shampoo for blonde hair toner that leverages the power of PRECISE COLOR ADJUSTMENT – a silver shampoo technology that delivers lighter and lighter results, the longer you leave it on. Just 2 to 5 minutes for instant results - your CONFIDENCE will thank you!

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE – BREAKTHROUGH FORMULATION, FAST RESULTS: You’ll notice a difference day one, guaranteed. How do we know? This tested, proven violet toning shampoo for blond hair is BETTER than other AWARD WINNING color shampoo formulations. So go ahead, Click Add to Cart now and extend your luminescent salon color until your next appointment, or your money back.

THE UV & DAMAGE DEFENDER – Shampoo for grey hair, silver and blond EXTENDS SALON COLOR well beyond the typical time, no matter how unique your hair color. Our PASSION-DRIVEN, PROTEIN RICH purple shampoo for brassy hair complex defies the most common causes of environment-related damage, blasé tones, breakage, and split ends for RADIANT HAIR that looks healthy under any lighting – even at the gym.

BYE BYE SWEAT BUILD UP, DIRT & GRIME - HELLO hair they can’t stop touching! If you want TOUCHABLE SOFT hair that matches that life you’ve worked so hard to create, get this shampoo for brassy hair now. We added extra nutrient-rich, lather enhancing plant based compounds that science shows LIFTS AWAY grime, dirt and excess oil, so your hair FEELS silky soft and managed.
